content: What could cause the IG build to forever be stuck on "Jekyll: Generating ..."?
It's not great on error handling. I've found that if I have a typo in a liquid command (like %include) it can hang

Dave got me really close. In my case I had a div %include of a svg that didn't exist. I had previously had a plantuml file, but in this case I didn't have that. so my markdown was calling for inclusion of a svg that didn't exist.
John Moehrke has marked this topic as resolved.
